BriefDescription: bytes all masters read from ddr based on read-cycles event imx8mp_ddr.read_cycles * 4 * 2 from x86/freescal/imx8mp
bytes all masters write to ddr based on write-cycles event imx8mp_ddr.write_cycles * 4 * 2 from x86/freescal/imx8mp
bytes of all masters read from ddr imx8_ddr0 at axid ... imx8mp_imx8_ddr0 from x86/freescal/imx8mp
